avalancheActivity.highlights: Not much snow in the area but the remaining snow is considered stable.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Not much snow in the area. The remaining snow is considered mostly stable after freeze/thaw cycles.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow is widely considered stable but wind slabs are present in the Eastfjords.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow is widely considered stable but wind slabs are present in the Eastfjords.

weatherForecast.highlights: Snýst í V-læga átt á fimmtudag, þykknar upp og hlýnar. Líkur á dálitlum skúrum.

avalancheActivity.highlights: There is some snow in the mountains but considered stable. Snow is in gullies and small slabs could be present.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Snow is generally considered stable in the area. Snow has accumulated in gullies and there are still possible windslabs high in starting zones and just below ridges. Little snow is at lower elevations.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow is widely considered stable but wind slabs are present in the Eastfjords.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow is widely considered stable but wind slabs are present in the Eastfjords.

weatherForecast.highlights: SV-átt á fimmtudag með dálítilli úrkomu, snjókoma til fjalla en rigning á láglendi. Svipað veður á föstudag en þá úrkomulaust.

avalancheActivity.highlights: A thin cover of snow is on top of the older snowwhich was considered stable in general after freeze/thaw cycles.

snowpackStructure.highlights: It snowed a bit on Tuesday and a thin cover of new snow is on top of the older one in some places. The old snow was considered stable. More snow is on SW/W aspects and inland. Little snow at low elevations.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow is widely considered stable but wind slabs are present in the Eastfjords.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow is widely considered stable but wind slabs are present in the Eastfjords.

weatherForecast.highlights: SV-læg átt næstu daga, líkur á éljum á fimmtudag og hlýnar dálítið. Hvessir seint á föstudag.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Some new snow is in the area and wind slabs could be present, especially on S-W aspects.

snowpackStructure.highlights: It has snowed a bit in recent days in strong N-E wind. Under the new snow was older snow at high elevations, especially in gullies and lows. Wind slabs are likely present, especially on S-W aspects.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow is widely considered stable but wind slabs are present in the Eastfjords.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow is widely considered stable but wind slabs are present in the Eastfjords.

weatherForecast.highlights: V-læg átt á fimmtudag og líkur á dálítilli snjókomu um tíma. Bjart að mestu á föstudag.
